sentence.Network_en: The waters of the Yangtze River are dangerously high for the time of year.
sentence.Network_cn: 长江的水位每年这个时候都处于危险的高位。

sentence.Network_en: This year water levels in the middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze are unusually high.
sentence.Network_cn: 长江今年中下游的水位都过高。

sentence.Network_en: Hong Yun became known after she had narrated the TV programme of the Story of the Yangtze River.
sentence.Network_cn: 虹云解说了《话说长江》电视节目之后便出了名.
